DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study explore Tolerability Safety H-Coil deep Transcranial Magnetic Stimulation ( TMS ) combination Serotonin Selective Reuptake Inhibitor ( SSRI ) Subjects Major Depression Disorder ( MDD ) Complete/ Discontinued Deep TMS Multicenter study Subjects Major Depression Disorder ( MDD ) ( Protocol # CTP-0001-00 ) .
DOC.brief_title: Prospective Multicenter Trial Explore Tolerability Safety H-Coil Deep TMS Combination With Serotonin Selective Reuptake Inhibitor ( SSRI )
DOC.criteria: Outpatients Men woman 2268 year age Primary DSMIV diagnosis Major Depression , single recurrent episode confirm Structured Clinical Interview DSMIV ( SCIDIV ) . Completed CTP000100 study accord protocol , i.e. , either complete 16 week treatment , discontinue CTP000100 study protocol 6 week randomization . Capable willing provide inform consent . Able adhere treatment schedule . Discontinued CTP000100 study protocol due follow reason : Tolerability safety reason , Noncompliant study protocol , Developed document suicidal ideation assess investigator significant suicide risk base HDRS21 item 3 score 3 4 suicidal attempt Current psychotic disorder Sensitivity allergic severe adverse event previously report Citalopram , Escitalopram , Fluoxetine , Paroxetine , Sertraline . Known suspect pregnancy Women childbearing potential use medically accept form contraception engage sexual intercourse . Minimal MT find hand high 75 % stimulator power output .
